txt.en: 'Whoever now commands the forces of the Enemy is bold, indeed.'
Instance: The Foe Resurgent
'To pin us between the forces on the field and those out of Osgiliath is wise, but I shall not allow it.'
'[placeholder], we must move now!'
'Éomer rode south, towards the Hillock - we shall meet him there and make our stand together!'
'We shall not rest until our foes are swept from the field!'
'They're here! On your feet, maggots!'
As the Mûmakil rears and stomps, you hear Derufin scream in the distance and then only silence
'They have been thrown into a fury! They scream of their King's death!'
'Hold! Know you these men?'
'[placeholder], I trust in your choice of allies, but how are we to pass that?'
'A massive beast with well-nigh a score of men atop it - how can we fell such a foe?'
'You are flanked! Run, boy!'
'Stand aside!'
'No! Run not to your death!'
'Have you not heard? The King returns from Minas Ithil at long last!'
'What horror! What a sorry end!'
'The Witch-king of Angmar is slain. Victory has been won!'
'Make haste, lest we share their fate!'
'The Stewards are naught but pretenders - cowards who denied the might of our King.'
'There is time not to mourn until the battle's ending!'
'Eärnur, Mordirith, Gothmog... whichever you name him, his claim is unbroken!'
'Orcs ahead! To arms!'
'The throne is his once more and ever it shall be!'
'For Rohan and Gondor!'
'Surrender or die!'
'Stand down, Orc, and your death shall be swift!'
'Fools! Gothmog commands the hosts of Mordor and Minas Morgul!'
'Come, [placeholder], we must press on!'
'You have merely battled against a small measure of his strength!'
'See you the Hillock? We must reach it!'
'Hold, my friend. We cannot go further....'
'Look... one of the Enemy's vile beasts feasts upon the dead.'
'The mere sight of that Black Rider fills me with dread. We must travel another way!'
'Men in shining blue armour and one who looks to be their captain!'
'A Prince, you say?'
'They are under attack! Let us aid them!'
'I am glad we could be of aid to you, Prince Imrahil.'
'I am Reeve Ingbert of Rohan, and it seems you know well of my companion.'
'We make for the Hillock. Will you join us?'
'Let us make haste then... before the Enemy's forces overtake our position!'
'What does this foul wraith speak of?'
'The path is clear! We must move now before our chance is lost!'
'Still... I fear what that wraith threatened cannot be so easily dismissed.'
'[placeholder]!'
'Another friend of yours, I presume? I am Duilin and this is Derufin.'
'Duilin...'
'We are brothers of the Blackroot Vale, and we aim to avenge our fallen.'
'Go, my friend, I shall draw them away....'
'Derufin....'
'Indeed, while you were away, we slew four of them that dared to approach the walls of the City!'
'Follow me, you hideous beast! Follow me and die!'
'After I put out this beast's eyes, we can move to the Orc encampment ahead.'
'Hold fast! We are not yet beaten!'
'Ready, brother? I shall move in first.'
'Your timing is fortunate, [placeholder]! And who is this warrior?'
'Look at me, beast of Harad!'
'The Southrons do not relent! Steady now!'
'Derufin, now!'
'Our forces are scattered at best and slain at worst.'
'Ahhh... one of their arrows....'
'If victory is to be won, we must follow you to the Hillock. Let us go!'
'You speak only lies. The Last King is dead!'
'A wraith bearing a crown is no King.'
'Flee to the evil that spawned you, wraith, and tell him that Gondor shall not fall!'
'Hah! Feast on their flesh, my pets!'
'Ah, one of the horse-men! Your steeds have fed me and my Wargs well!
'Only when the hour is too late shall you understand the horrors that await you....'
'It is good to see you, friend, but stay quiet... else those Mûmakil might hear us.'
'Those Mûmakil shall be felled and their riders thrown down - I swear it!'
'Only arrows to the eye can fell those beasts... for their hides are like stone.'
'We have done it before, and we shall do it again!'
'The Mûmakil are far too large to follow us there.'
'We shall blind them and then press our attack from the cover of those Orkish tents.'
'The Black Serpent shall be reborn!'
'Of course. Stand back, friends, and let us handle these beasts!'
'Death to the King-slayers!'
'Brother, what has happened?'
'The fangs of Harad shall close on you all!'
'Duilin! No!'
